Other Miscellaneous Agro Products
JANUZ Universal
JANUZ Universal is a Supplier&Exporter of a variety of products from INDIA to various countries across the globe. The items we ship include: Spices / Masalas, Whole Grains / Atta, Pulses / Lentils / Dals, Sweets, Mango Pulp, Biscuits / Snacks / Namkeens, Beverages like Tea / Coffee, Cooking Oils, Frozen Foods, Heat and Eat, Instant Mixes/Ready to Cook, Kitchen / Household Equipment, Cosmetics / Toiletries / Ayurvedic Products, Tobacco Products Agarbathis (Incense Sticks) / Aromas / Fragrances / Spa products, amongst many others, Book library (cookery / religious / others) »View Catalogs »Company Info Address : 305, Mahinder Chambers 619 / 28 W.T. Patil Marg Chembur, Mumbai, Maharashtra - 400 071. India Phone No. : 91-22-25215488
